author: Kevin Scholla, Kevin Scholla
title: It Took a Pandemic to Finally Tame Those Wild 1986 Mets (A Little)
description: It's hard to imagine the 1986 New York Mets confined in any way, shape or form, but just like most Americans, the wild boys of baseball are currently safe at home like never before.
content:
It’s hard to imagine the 1986 New York Mets confined in any way, shape or form, but just like most Americans, the wild boys of baseball are currently safe at home like never before.
